text: Boris von Raukov is Valmir's eighth son. He left Ostland to pursue a military career. He is currently the captain of the 4th Nuln Halberdiers, a mercenary regiment based in the city of Nuln, who fought alongside the Grudgebringers.
Renowned Captain of the Carroburg Greatswords Regiment
Renowned Captain of the Helmgart Bowmen from Helmgart Fortress
Founder and commander of the mercenary company called the Grudgebringers, named after Morgan's magic sword Grudgebringer.
